sources.title: Sailing and Village Band (1958)
sources.description: Sailing and Village Band is a Jolly Frolics cartoon directed by Fred Crippen, Lew Keller. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/sailing-and-village-band-1958/

metadata.Plot: The second of UPA's split-reel cartoons in which there were two unrelated segments---one with Hattie and one with Ham---of 3.5 minutes each. The first one---Sailing" has young Hattie sailing her boat in a fountain and is quite dismayed when a frog sinks it. She brightens up when a friendly policeman restores it for her. The second unrelated segment---"The Village Band"--- features Hamilton Ham in the story of a village band that goes unappreciated by the populace until it is needed to greet a distinguished dignitary.
